DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field used to capture the controls of the assay.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic test in which an antibody is used to link a cellular antigen specifically to a stain that can be seen with a microscope._A method of measuring the effects of a biologically active substance using an intermediate in vivo or in vitro tissue or cell model under controlled conditions. (from MSH98)_Happening or arising or located within some limits, or especially, within some surface._The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic test in which an antibody is used to link a cellular antigen specifically to a stain that can be seen with a microscope.:A method of measuring the effects of a biologically active substance using an intermediate in vivo or in vitro tissue or cell model under controlled conditions. (from MSH98)

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic test in which an antibody is used to link a cellular antigen specifically to a stain that can be seen with a microscope.
A laboratory test or analysis of the biological activity of a substance performed by studying its effect on an organism or in a test tube under controlled conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Happening or arising or located within some limits, or especially, within some surface.:The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.

Concepts.definition: Happening or arising or located within some limits, or especially, within some surface.
The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free-text field used to capture the controls of the assay.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Happening or arising or located within some limits, or especially, within some surface.:The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.
Happening or arising or located within some limits, or especially, within some surface.
The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.
